title: Journal of a tour and residence in Great Britain, during the years 1810 and 1811, by a French traveller :
author: Simond, L.
snippet: Jiiljl 1. — From Niton (the troops quart(Ted here are English,) we ])roceeded along the Under-cliff, by Mirables, St Laurence, Steop-liill, Bon-Cluirch, — a succession of very beautiful spots.
